author: Flo
content:
You're almost over it! LOL. I've never been captured by video games or computer games. But they do serve a purpose in some people's lives. I guess it's like those who do crosswords and math puzzles and brain teasers - it's a good mental exercise.

As I look at this image, I wonder whether, if you were to photograph this same scene 4 times, once for each season, which I'd like better. Perhaps some day you'll post the 4 seasons, if you have such for any particular scene?
